1617620.name: UNIVERSE PRISON Demo
1617620.description:
≪Extreme survival adventure. Escape from the vast "Universe Prison" dungeon of all 10 dimension floors!≫
Roguelike 2D Random Dungeon RPG with Turn-based Command-selection Battle system.
Everything are randomly setting, playing character, enemies, party members, maps, items, equipment, shops, facilities, etc.

-------------------
Demo:
In this trial(demo) version, player can play early few stages.
This includes most of the essence elements of this game.
Player will understand what playing feeling of this game.
